title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Sections 384, 384-C), form 384-2 - Order directing service in proceeding for approval of surrender instrument
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms (Social Services Law Sections 384, 384-C), form 384-2 - Order directing service in proceeding for approval of surrender instrument

State Regulations

Soc. Serv. Law §§ 384, 384-c

Form 384-2
(Order Directing Service
in Proceeding for

Approval of Surrender

Instrument)
12/97

At a term of the Family Court of
the

State of New York, held in and for
the County of, at, New York
on, 19. P R E S E N T: Hon. Judge
________
In the Matter of the Application for

Approval Docket No. of a Surrender Instrument

Concerning
ORDER DIRECTING
SERVICE OF NOTICE
Pursuant to Section 384 of the

Social

Services Law. ________
A petition requesting approval of an
instrument of surrender, dated the day of, 19, concerning, pursuant to section
384
of the

Social Services Law having been filed with this Court and it appearing that
notice should be given to the person(s) hereinafter named, it is hereby
ORDERED that notice of the hearing
together with a copy of the petition filed herein shall be served (personally)
(registered mail) (certified mail, return receipt requested) () upon the
following person(s) at least twenty days before the date set for such
hearing: PURSUANT TO SECTION
1113
OF THE
FAMILY COURT ACT, AN APPEAL FROM THIS ORDER MUST BE TAKEN WITHIN 30 DAYS OF
RECEIPT OF THE ORDER BY APPELLANT IN COURT, 35 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF MAILING OF
THE ORDER TO APPELLANT BY THE CLERK OF COURT, OR 30 DAYS AFTER SERVICE BY A
PARTY OR THE LAW GUARDIAN UPON THE APPELLANT, WHICHEVER IS EARLIEST. ENTER
______________
J.F.C. Dated:, 19. Check applicable box: Order mailed on [specify date(s) and to
whom mailed]:____________
Order received in court on [specify
date(s) and to whom given]:____________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Foster Care Forms
(Social Services Law Sections 384, 384-C), form
384-2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
